title: Organization of the Levites
summary: David organizes the Levites into groups based on their duties related to temple service. He divides them by family and assigns tasks such as music, gatekeeping, and assisting the priests.

faq.question: What were the Levitesâ€™ roles?
faq.answer: They assisted the priests, kept order in the temple, and led in worship.

faq.question: How old did Levites need to be to serve?
faq.answer: David lowered the age of service to 20 years and above.
